name: Chris Pratt
tweet: Here's my thoughts on the Dasgupta Review and what it means for business. Main takeaway is that companies that want to lead need to get going. It's not all on them, but they can have a massive influence on the changes that are urgently needed  https://t.co/RUZbtgyy3m #biodiversity
